creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
A problem with the 1.2rc2 version binary distribution:

The lenya.sh script has DOS line breaks, which yields error messages from the 
shell that are not easy to understand.

Workarround:

dos2unix lenya.sh
chmod ugo+x lenya.sh

(Reported by Torsten Schlabach)
it means i wont be doing the linux builds :)
creator: gregor@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text:
I fixed the permission problem. However, I cannot reproduce the part about DOS
line breaks in the CVS version. Could you double check?

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I had can confirm that something is wrong with lenya.sh in the binary distribution of 1.2RC2. 
Using dos2unix solved that problem for me.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
fixed in cvs a while ago.

andreas: yes its still in rc2 since that didnt change
